tool_description: An API showing terrorism news from various sources around the world
name: Terrorism Live
title: Terrorism Live

api_list.name: Get Individual News Source News
api_list.description: Gets Individual News Source About Terrorism News
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://terrorism-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/thetimes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "terrorism-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://terrorism-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "terrorism-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Terrorism News
api_list.description: This end point will return all Terrorism News from all over the world
